committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to provide for issuance of a 7-day permit for the Grand Circle Adventure comprising 7 national parks in Utah, Colorado, and Arizona.

summary.text: Amends the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 to require the Secretary of the Interior to make available a seven-day admission permit (Grand Circle Adventure Passport) for entry to the Arches National Park, Bryce Canyon National Park, Canyonlands National Park, Capitol Reef National Park, Zion National Park, Mesa Verde National Park, and the Grand Canyon National Park (Grand Circle Adventure) in Utah, Colorado, and Arizona.

titles.title: A bill to provide for issuance of a 7-day permit for the Grand Circle Adventure comprising 7 national parks in Utah, Colorado, and Arizona.
